name: Hive Assault
description:
This project was created for the CGA Game Jam during the month of June, 2017.

Giant moths have come to take over the world!  As an expert fighter pilot, you must fly your plane into their hive and exterminate them once and for all!

This is a survival game, where you must defeat as many enemies as you can before losing all of your lives.  As your score increases, your enemies will slowly start moving faster, and increase in their numbers.

This can be played with either 1 or 2 players.  In 2 player mode, you can either play a co-op game where lives are shared and scores are added up together, OR you can play in versus mode, where both players compete to achieve the highest score.  Beware, for players can attack each other, even in co-op mode!
